project.name: checkstyle
project.build-command:
#!/usr/bin/env bash if test -e classpath.txt; then exit fi
set -e
# Make sure to use java11. This is already installed by build.sh export JAVA_HOME=${HOME}/openjdk11 export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH
mvn test-compile -B mvn dependency:build-classpath -DincludeScope=test -Dmdep.outputFile=classpath.txt -B
